INJURY NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Friday 3/3/2025 :
Frank Ambrosino was injured while pitching.
Diagnosis: Strained Elbow Ligament.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.
Saturday 3/4/2025 :
William Sullivan was injured when he was hit by a line drive.
Diagnosis: Scratched Cornea Eye.
He is out for about 1-2 weeks.

Vinny Rivera was injured while pitching.
Diagnosis: Pulled Elbow Ligament.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Diagnosis: Jammed Finger.
He is out for about one week.

Diagnosis: Fractured Hip.
He will be OK in about 6 weeks.
